message: The goal of the group is to aggregate all of the papers that have been published on the topic.  It is an open group; everyone can contribute, and the service is free.

There is a Mendeley group(an academic paper management and social networking service) on the topic of using Python in science and high performance computing available at this link: http://www.mendeley.com/groups/1221541/high-level-languages-in-high-performance-computing/
